message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $6000, you get $4000.  It's in your best interest to agree quickly before inflation eats away at your share!
I understand the time pressure, but that offer wasn't fair to me. Let's split the difference a bit more this time.
Bob, time is running out for both of us, especially you. I'm willing to meet in the middle, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile. $5500 for me, $4500 for you.
